mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.kecheng_id as kechengId ,a.jiaoxuejihua_uuid_number as jiaoxuejihuaUuidNumber ,a.jiaoxuejihua_name as jiaoxuejihuaName ,a.jiaoxuejihua_file as jiaoxuejihuaFile ,a.jiaoxuejihua_types as jiaoxuejihuaTypes ,a.jiaoxuejihua_content as jiaoxuejihuaContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,kecheng.jiaoshi_id as kechengJiaoshiId ,kecheng.kecheng_name as kechengName ,kecheng.kecheng_uuid_number as kechengUuidNumber ,kecheng.kecheng_photo as kechengPhoto ,kecheng.kecheng_video as kechengVideo ,kecheng.kecheng_file as kechengFile ,kecheng.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,kecheng.kecheng_clicknum as kechengClicknum ,kecheng.kecheng_content as kechengContent ,kecheng.zhishiyaodian_content as zhishiyaodianContent ,kecheng.kaoshidagang_content as kaoshidagangContent ,kecheng.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,kecheng.kecheng_delete as kechengDelete ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM jiaoxuejihua a left JOIN kecheng kecheng ON a.kecheng_id = kecheng.id left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} or kecheng.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and ( a.kecheng_id = #{params.kechengId} )
and a.jiaoxuejihua_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoxuejihuaUuidNumber},'%')
and a.jiaoxuejihua_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoxuejihuaName},'%')
and a.jiaoxuejihua_types = #{params.jiaoxuejihuaTypes}
and a.jiaoxuejihua_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoxuejihuaContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.kecheng_id IS NOT NULL
and kecheng.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and kecheng.kecheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengUuidNumber},'%')
and kecheng.kecheng_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengVideo},'%')
and kecheng.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and kecheng.kecheng_clicknum >= #{params.kechengClicknumStart}
and kecheng.kecheng_clicknum <= #{params.kechengClicknumEnd}
and kecheng.kecheng_clicknum = #{params.kechengClicknum}
and kecheng.kecheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengContent},'%')
and kecheng.zhishiyaodian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhishiyaodianContent},'%')
and kecheng.kaoshidagang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshidagangContent},'%')
and kecheng.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
and kecheng.kecheng_delete >= #{params.kechengDeleteStart}
and kecheng.kecheng_delete <= #{params.kechengDeleteEnd}
and kecheng.kecheng_delete = #{params.kechengDelete}
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
